full_text: Is sustainability a core value of your org? Prashant Ketkar, @corelsoftware's Chief Technology and Product Officer, shared his insights with @DIGIWORLD_INFO about the shift to sustainability and the green future of work. https://t.co/CGOSI9yOWg
